thread.section_title: DXL Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DXL | destinationxl.com | 2 of 263
thread.title: Jackson S.

author: Jackson S.
title: Jackson S.
text: I've been shopping at the Delaware Casual Male, now DXL, since I was 19. The store manager has been in place since this time, and over the years we have gone from customer/retailer to friends. It is a pleasure every time I visit the store, as all employees are friendly, and more than willing to help. They remember names, preferences, and sizes. The selection of clothing keeps getting better and better. I would not hesitate to send anyone to the store.
